first_section.title: What is Focallocal?
first_section.content: Focallocal is an open, worldwide community of people creating positive action. We empower people to build a friendlier, happier world where people look out for each other.
first_section.content_subtitle: Join us and turn Public Happiness into a daily habit!

video.title: Focallocal - Meet Me and Take #PublicHappiness Worldwide

second_section.title: How It Works
content: **Local Action, Global Impact** – Small efforts create big ripples. By working together, we create a wave of positive change.
**Community-Powered Solutions** – Connected communities are stronger and better at solving their own challenges.
**Fun & Sustainability** – If it's not fun, it won't last! We make social change enjoyable and engaging

third_section.title: Our Mission
third_section.content: We're building a movement to overcome social isolation and create positive cultural change through community action.

video.title: Building Positive Change Through Community Action
